trans-unit.source: Represents a secure conversation security session.
trans-unit.target: 表示安全對話安全性工作階段。

trans-unit.source: The communicating parties secure all messages on the session using a <see langword="SecurityContextToken" /> that is issued by the server as part of session establishment.
trans-unit.target: 通訊雙方會使用伺服器在工作階段建立時一併核發的 <see langword="SecurityContextToken" />，來保護工作階段上所有訊息的安全。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> with which to try to read the token.
trans-unit.target: 要用來嘗試讀取權杖的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Tries to read the session token identifier pointed to by the XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試讀取 XML 讀取器所指向的工作階段權杖識別碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the XML pointed to by the XML reader corresponds to a <see langword="SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that matches the security session's token; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 讀取器指向的 XML 會對應至與安全性工作階段權杖相符的 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see langword="SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for sessions like WS-RM sessions that build on top of the security session and refer to the security session token's identifier as part of their session establishment protocol.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法對於像 WS-RM 工作階段這樣的工作階段會十分有用，這類工作階段建置在安全性工作階段之上，而且會在其工作階段建立通訊協定中參考此安全性工作階段權杖的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> with which to try to write the token.
trans-unit.target: 要用來嘗試寫入權杖的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Tries to write the <see langword="SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> corresponding to the security session's token.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試寫入對應於安全性工作階段權杖的 <see langword="SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for sessions like WS-RM sessions that build on top of the security session and refer to the security session token's identifier as part of their session establishment protocol.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法對於像 WS-RM 工作階段這樣的工作階段會十分有用，這類工作階段建置在安全性工作階段之上，而且會在其工作階段建立通訊協定中參考此安全性工作階段權杖的識別碼。
